title: PM congratulates Independent Group on winning SCBA election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif Thursday congratulated Independent Group on winning the election of Supreme Court Bar Association (SCBA).
He extended special felicitation to the head of the Independent Group Ahsan Bhoon.
The Prime Minister also congratulated the newly elected President Haroonur Rashid and Secretary Zahid Aslam Awan and other office bearers and expressed his best wishes for their future.
He said, “The government always considered the legal community as an important partner in the reform process. In this regard, Minister for Law and Justice, Azam Nazeer Tarar is always in touch with the lawyers.”
He said the newly elected President Haroonur Rashid and his office bearers will continue the mission of supremacy of the Constitution and law in the country and will work for welfare of lawyers.
